Frontend Developer & UI Designer

Passionate frontend developer and designer aspiring to craft beautiful and engaging user experience.

Leading teams to embrace responsive web design and building scalable CSS architecture. Big fan and follower of Agile methodologies. Able to work under pressure and delivering quality under budget. Dedicated to building pristine frontend code and innovative results. Forever enthusiastic to learn new skills, thrive on criticism and challenges, and always seeking the perfect blend of creativity and technology.

Competent in
HTML5, CSS3, Sass, JavaScript, responsive web design, git, working in Agile environment, Magento, WordPress, SilverStripe, graphic design.

NZ Citizen, with native English and Chinese.

Professional Experience

SilverStripe

Auckland, April 2014 ~ present

Software company behind the S​ilverStripe PHP Framework and CMS, ​and the C​ommon Web Platform for New Zealand Government websites. SilverStripe works with clients across public sectors, banking, utilities and telecommunication, and supporting the global opensource community. It has offices in New Zealand (Wellington HQ and Auckland), Australia and UK.

UX Developer

Develop scalable frontend code for bespoke enterprise and government projects. Design and implement responsive design and interactive UI. Consult clients on UX. Deliver and advocate Agile. Collaborate with different parties, such as tech partners and creative agencies, to deliver enterprise level projects.

Project highlights
  • Westpac NZ Brand Refresh,​ first responsive theme for Westpac
  • Westpac AirNZ Airpoints application portal.​ Building an online application to convert competitor bank’s credit card customers to Westpac NZ. The project had a hard deadline where most of us worked 2+ weeks (with over time) non­stop to deliver.

Lero9

Auckland, June 2012 ~ March 2014

Boutique digital agency centered at delivering B2C and B2B eCommerce solutions for large retailers and organisations, on the Magento Commerce platform.

Frontend Developer & Web Designer

Design and develop Magento and WordPress sites. Produce wire frames and spec documents. First to pioneer the company to adopt responsive web design, and built Lero9’s first responsive eCommerce framework. Frontend development almost always delivered within budget.

Project highlights

Orchid Web Design

Auckland, November 2010 ~ June 2012

Boutique web design company working with ad agencies and SMEs to design and/or develop mainly WordPress and Magento websites.

Web Designer & Frontend Developer

Work with ad agencies to consult on proper web design approach and develop the frontend. Design and develop websites on Magento, WordPress, and SilverStripe. Implement social media and online marketing campaigns.

Exceed Online

Auckland, April 2007 ~ July 2009

Full service eCommerce consultancy firm focusing on delivering Magento projects for large retailers, and providing online marketing services to improve online sales and conversion.

Clients span across New Zealand and Australia, and a few from USA. Exceed also partnered with Australian company Alkemi to provide a broader range of online consultancy services.

Project Coordinator & Frontend Developer

Manage eCommerce and web projects. Develop Magento sites and various frontend development tasks. SEM and SEO implementations. Provide clients with CMS training and helpdesk support. First to introduce wire frame process to projects.

Project highlights
  • Created wire frame based on Radius Pharmacy’s IA documentations provided by Alkemi. Developed the eCommerce site in Magento (website no longer available)
  • Avis and Budget rental car conversion optimisation implementations
